title: (x) A FOUND TYPEFACE - Engraver's Roman {Tiff}
content:
Someone a while back asked about a typeface that we were all guessing, ok I was guessing, was some in the Engraver's vein ... I found the typeface. Hope this gets to the right person.   
   
 ![Engraver's by Bitstream](http://web.archive.org/web/20071201030918im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25164.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Gyllene Tider" script - Palace Script (modified) {Mike F}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071201030918/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2861 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Common videogame font - Reishotai (?) {Aleph Langley} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071201030918/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2823 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content: Sorry forgot to post a link: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/engravers-roman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071201030918/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/engravers-roman/)
